summary: This document is an email forwarding a New York Times article from April 28, 2020. The article discusses the Attorney General's concerns about excessive secrecy in the administration of Jeffrey Epstein's estate. It highlights ongoing legal and financial scrutiny following Epstein's death.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.role: Deceased financier and accused sex trafficker
persons.context: The subject of the estate being discussed; his death and the administration of his assets are the central topics of the forwarded article.

events.title: NYT Article on Epstein Estate Secrecy
events.description: The New York Times publishes an article reporting that the Attorney General sees too much secrecy in the administration of Jeffrey Epstein's estate.

keyFacts: The Attorney General of the United States (or a state) has raised concerns about excessive secrecy surrounding Jeffrey Epstein's estate.
The issue was reported in a New York Times article dated April 27, 2020.
The document is an email from April 28, 2020, forwarding a link to that article, indicating ongoing legal and financial scrutiny of Epstein's affairs after his death.
